title: Isle Royale National Park: Fees Associated with Commercial Filming and Still Photography Permits
body: Fees Associated with Commercial Filming and Still Photography Permits           Fees for Commercial Filming and Still Photography     Commercial Filming/Videos     Still Photography     1-2 people Camera & Tripod only  $0/day   1-2 people Camera and Tripod only $0/day   1-10 people $150/day   1-10 people $50/day   11-30 people $250/day   11-30 people $150/day   31-49 people $500/day   Over 30 people $250/day     To make payment, click here.
